curam.util.audit
Interface DataAccessHook

public interface DataAccessHook

This interface provides the contract for pre data access handling. The class that implements this interface is specified in the property curam.custom.predataaccess.hook. If this property is empty no pre data access will occur.

Method Summary
 void preDataAccess(java.lang.String tableName, java.lang.String opName, java.lang.Object keyObject, java.lang.Object beforeObject, java.lang.Object afterObject, AuditLogInterface.OperationType operationType)
          This method is called by the system to allow pre data access for data access methods for which table level auditing is enabled.
 

Method Detail

preDataAccess

void preDataAccess(java.lang.String tableName,
                   java.lang.String opName,
                   java.lang.Object keyObject,
                   java.lang.Object beforeObject,
                   java.lang.Object afterObject,
                   AuditLogInterface.OperationType operationType)
                   throws AppException,
                          InformationalException
This method is called by the system to allow pre data access for data access methods for which table level auditing is enabled.

Parameters:
tableName - The table which is being updated.
opName - The name of the method on the entity which initiated the data access.
keyObject - The object that represents the key structure.
beforeObject - The object that contains the values of the various fields before they were updated as part of a data access. This should be null if the client code cannot diagnose the value.
afterObject - The object that contains the values of the various fields as they will be after they are updated as part of a data access. This should never be null.
operationType - The operation type that caused the audit record to be produced.
Throws:
AppException - If an exception is thrown the transaction associated with the business method will be rolled back and no audit information will be logged.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.
